text: What Will People Say () is a 2017 internationally co-produced drama film directed and written by Iram Haq. The movie's scenes set in Pakistan were all shot in India, mostly in Rajasthan. == Cast == * Maria Mozhdah - Nisha * Ekavali Khanna - Najma, Nisha's mother * Rohit Suresh Saraf - Amir, Nisha's cousin * Ali Arfan - Asif, Nisha's older brother * Sheeba Chaddha - Nisha's paternal aunt, Mirza's sister * Jannat Zubair Rahmani - Salima, Nisha's cousin * Himanshu Jaykar - Salima's Brother * Lalit Parimoo - Nisha's uncle * Farukh Jaffer - Nisha's grandmother, Mirza's mother ==Related pages== * List of submissions to the 91st Academy Awards for Best Foreign Language Film * List of Norwegian submissions for the Academy Award for Best Foreign Language Film == References == == Other websites == * Category:2017 drama movies Category:Norwegian drama movies Category:German drama movies Category:Swedish drama movies Category:French drama movies Category:Danish drama movies Category:Indian movies Category:Movies about religion
title: What Will People Say
